verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4046>plague,<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> throughout their <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that are able to <S%H3318>go<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Take the sum of the people, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> the eldest <S%H1060>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben;<s%> <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> of whom cometh the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2599>Hanochites:<s%> of <S%H6396>Pallu,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the Palluites: <S%H6384><s%>
Of <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2697>Hezronites:<s%> of <S%H3756>Carmi,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3757>Carmites.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites:<s%> and they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6396>Pallu;<s%> <S%H446>Eliab.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab;<s%> <S%H5241>Nemuel,<s%> and <S%H1885>Dathan,<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram.<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> is that <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> which were <S%H7148>famous<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5327>strove<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H5712>company<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> when they <S%H5327>strove<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and swallowed them up <S%H1104>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> when that <S%H5712>company<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> what time the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> and they <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H5251>sign.<s%>
Notwithstanding the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> after their <S%H4940>families:<s%> of <S%H5241>Nemuel,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5242>Nemuelites:<s%> of <S%H3226>Jamin,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3228>Jaminites:<s%> of <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the Jachinites: <S%H3200><s%>

To <S%H7227>many<s%> thou shalt give the <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and to <S%H4592>few<s%> thou shalt give the <S%H4591>less<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> to every <S%H376>one<s%> shall his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> according <S%H6310>to<s%> those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of him.
